quote.name: Mitchell Baker, Executive Chairwoman and CEO of the Mozilla Foundation and of Mozilla Corporation
quote.text:
"The need for free and open source software is as essential now as it was 40 years ago when the GNU project was founded. Free and open source software demonstrates that is possible to voluntarily collaborate in the creation of valuable assets, and to share the use of those assets universally. Free and opens source software bring a different approach to the power to create and control technical assets.
It also brings a different perspective to social structure, with its focus on voluntary communities organized to create common good. These perspectives are desperately needed today, as new forms of software, data and technology continue to radically change our lives.‚Äù
